April 24, 1988 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £80 and cup, 2nd £45 and cup, 3rd £35 and cup, 4th £25. March contest - 1st(£15 and cup) Boarshurst, 2nd(£10) Holme Silver. 8 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 2:21 p.m. June 28, 2016, 10:36 a.m.
